commit.message:
Merge pull request #2855 from uHOOCCOOHu/impl-fn-lifetime

Fix false positive `unused_lifetime` when referenced in generic bounds.

Merge pull request #2855 from uHOOCCOOHu/impl-fn-lifetime

Fix false positive `unused_lifetime` when referenced in generic bounds.
